statements: SELECT * FROM test_questions;
SELECT question_text, question_difficulty FROM test_questions;
SELECT question_id, question_text, question_difficulty FROM test_questions WHERE question_difficulty > 3;
SELECT question_text AS text, question_difficulty AS difficulty FROM test_questions ORDER BY question_difficulty DESC;
SELECT question_id, UPPER(question_text) AS text, question_difficulty * 2 AS adjusted_difficulty FROM test_questions;
SELECT * FROM test_questions WHERE question_difficulty > 3;
SELECT question_text FROM test_questions WHERE question_id = 5;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM test_questions WHERE question_difficulty = 2 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM test_questions WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 4);
SELECT * FROM test_questions WHERE question_text LIKE '%database%';
SELECT * FROM test_questions;
SELECT question_text, question_id FROM test_questions;
SELECT question_text, question_id FROM test_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT question_text FROM test_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_responses JOIN test_questions ON student_responses.question_id = test_questions.question_id;
SELECT * FROM test_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT question_text FROM test_questions WHERE question_id >= 5 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT response, student_id FROM student_responses WHERE student_id = 100 AND question_id = 3;
SELECT response FROM student_responses WHERE response LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY response;
SELECT * FROM student_responses WHERE question_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND response IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM test_questions;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM test_questions;
SELECT student_id, response_text, response_time FROM student_responses ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT student_id, total_questions, correct_answers, percentage_correct FROM performance_analysis WHERE percentage_correct >= 80;
SELECT analysis_id, total_questions, correct_answers, percentage_correct FROM performance_analysis ORDER BY correct_answers DESC;
SELECT question_id, question_text, correct_answer FROM test_questions
SELECT analysis_id, student_id, total_questions, correct_answers, percentage_correct FROM performance_analysis ORDER BY percentage_correct DESC
SELECT * FROM student_responses WHERE student_id = '12345' AND response_time > '2022-01-01 00:00:00'
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM test_questions WHERE question_id IN (SELECT question_id FROM student_responses)
SELECT * FROM performance_analysis WHERE total_questions >= 10 AND correct_answers >= 8
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, class_id FROM students WHERE class_id = 10;
SELECT question_text, correct_answer FROM test_questions;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM test_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM performance_analysis GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM test_questions WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM test_questions WHERE correct_answer = 'A';
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score FROM performance_analysis;
SELECT student_name, class_id, response_text FROM students JOIN student_responses ON students.student_id = student_responses.student_id;
SELECT AVG(score) AS avg_score, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM performance_analysis GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, full_name, email FROM students;
SELECT test_name, total_questions FROM tests WHERE passing_score > 75;
SELECT response_text FROM student_responses WHERE response_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT question_text FROM test_questions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM test_questions WHERE question_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT response_text, response_time FROM student_responses WHERE student_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY response_time DESC;
SELECT test_name, passing_score FROM tests WHERE total_questions > 10 AND passing_score >= 0.75;
SELECT full_name, email FROM students ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT performance_id, student_id, test_id, score FROM performance_data WHERE score <= 80.0;
